mcq.statement: Which of the following is NOT one of the greenhouse gases regulated by the Kyoto Protocol?
mcq.one_liner: Among the greenhouse gases regulated by the Kyoto Protocol are **Carbon dioxide (CO2), Methane (CH4), and Nitrous oxide (N2O)**.
